cabins.name: Hunter's Lair
cabins.description: Hunters Lair is our largest cabin and is dedicated to the spirit of the hunt in our San Diego Backcountry. This rustic cabin is ideal for small family gatherings and can sleep 6. It's the nearest cabin to our restaurant and closest to Sunrise Highway. The Lair features 2 cozy bedrooms, bathroom/shower, a small kitchenette and living room with fireplace.
cabins.shortDescription: Largest cabin dedicated to the spirit of the hunt, sleeps 6

cabins.name: Fisherman's Landing
cabins.description: Fisherman's Landing is one of our larger cabins and commemorates our historic seafaring tradition in San Diego. This rustic cabin is ideal for small family gatherings and can sleep 6. The Landing is outfitted with a Queen bed, bunk bed with a full bed & twin bed, and a sofa bed. It features a large fireplace and small kitchenette, as well as in-suite bathroom/shower. There is also a loft with 4 sleeping pads.
cabins.shortDescription: Spacious cabin commemorating San Diego's seafaring tradition, sleeps 6

cabins.name: Hiker's Haven
cabins.description: Hikers Haven is for our trail lovers and is dedicated to our intricate network of trails through the Cleveland National Forest. This rustic cabin is one of our more secluded options and features a cozy fireplace, small kitchenette and bathroom/shower. It is outfitted with a California king bed, bunk bed and sofa bed and can sleep 5 people.
cabins.shortDescription: Trail lover's retreat with secluded mountain setting, sleeps 5

cabins.name: Stargazer
cabins.description: Stargazer is dedicated to our starry night skies and our Dark Sky designation in the San Backcountry. It is one of our most secluded cabins and is perfect for a romantic getaway for 2. Stargazer features a cozy fireplace, small kitchenette and bathroom/shower. It is outfitted with one queen bed and is the only pet friendly cabin we offer.
cabins.shortDescription: Romantic getaway under dark skies, pet friendly, sleeps 2

cabins.name: Wildlife Lookout
cabins.description: San Diego is one of the most rich & bio-diverse Eco-systems in the country! From high mountain peaks, forests, desert & beaches - we have it all! This diverse habitat is also home to an abundance of wildlife species. Wildlife Lookout is dedicated to this rich & bio-diverse heritage, which is one of our greatest destination hallmarks. This is our most secluded cabin with king bed, sofa bed and can sleep a family of 4. It has a bathroom/shower, a small kitchenette and living room with fireplace.
cabins.shortDescription: Most secluded cabin celebrating San Diego's biodiversity, sleeps 4
